mainText:
It's almost hard to believe considering yesterdays Apple presentation and
all the positive vibe. I'm speechless, Apple products and design has been
part of my life since I was 12, I'm 33 now. It inspired my career as a
designer in so many ways. Steve Jobs and Apple not only created amazing
products, but brought technology and user closer together like no other
company. His vision will be missed, and I hope someone at Apple learned
enough from this genius to keep bringing his vision for decades to come.
author: Filip
